message.content:
- Monday: Chicken Salad with lettuce, tomato, and grilled vegetables. No dairy or garlic allowed, but you can add some nuts like peanuts or almonds as a substitute for the cashews.
- Tuesday: Grilled salmon with steamed broccoli and spinach. You can use honey as a marinade instead of mustard if you prefer.
- Wednesday: Roasted chicken with pasta, vegetables, and a side salad. No dairy or garlic allowed, but you could add some grilled veggies to the salad for extra nutrients.
- Thursday: Grilled chicken with asparagus, mushrooms, and broccoli. You can use almonds instead of pistachios in the side dish.
- Friday: Roasted chicken with steamed vegetables and brown rice. No dairy or garlic allowed, so you can add some cheese to the dish for protein.
- Saturday: Grilled salmon with asparagus, zucchini, and broccoli.
- Sunday: Chicken stir fry with vegetables and brown rice. You can omit the dairy or garlic in this meal as well.

I hope you enjoy these healthy options! Let me know if you have any questions or need more suggestions.
